p_64: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).
h3_68: # of Filled Resident Positions, by Year*

th_101: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_104: The diagnostic radiology program at Franciscan Health Olympia Fields is a 5-year categorical residency dedicated to training well qualified physicians to become skilled diagnostic radiologists. Our excellent case load, favorable faculty-to-resident ratio, access to state-of-the-art imaging equipment, and proximity to some of the nation's foremost medical institutions help our residents gain an unmatched education in radiology. Follow us on Twitter @Franciscan_Rads!
